entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
